output.sentences: Wedding love is happening down on the beach.
After all that loving, Mrs. needs a refreshing treat.
All Mr. knows is that he needs some meat, and now!
What in the world are these two doing eating in a convenience store??
Who knows, but they are heading back to the beach to eat.
